text: The Mayor may promulgate rules and regulations for the proper administration of the provisions of §§ 47-845 and 47-846.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 47-862.

1973 Ed., § 47-662.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-119, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-824.

References in Text

Section 47-846 was repealed by § 3 of D.C. Law 4-128.

DC CODE § 47-862

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Real Property Assessment and Tax. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Rules and regulations for tax deferral provisions.
